item.title: Raspberry Pi Motion & Face Detection
item.description: A few weeks after my terrible MTB accident where I tore my ACL on my left knee, I was off from work for a few weeks, and I kind of got bored with just laying in the bed and was pondering what I could be doing something meaningful. Then this idea stuck my mind, why not try doing a small CCTV camera for my home? I started to do a bit of research on what hardware I need.
